metadata.title: CVE-2007-0255 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: XINE 0.99.4 allows user-assisted remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (application crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via acertain M3U file that contains a long #EXTINF line and contains formatstring specifiers in an invalid udp:// URI, possibly a variant ofCVE-2007-0017.

criterions.comment: xine-ui package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
